column2: title=The Two Towers: The Best of White Dwarf Magazine

date=[[2003]]<ref>[http://www.amazon.com/Lord-Rings-Towers-Compilation-Magazine/dp/B000MBZH78/ref=sr_1_1?s=books&ie=UTF8&qid=1316297937&sr=1-1 The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers Compilation] at [http://www.amazon.com/ref=gno_logo Amazon.com] (accessed 17 September 2011)</ref>

column1: '''''The Two Towers: The Best of White Dwarf Magazine''''' is a collection of articles, originally published in various issues of ''[[White Dwarf]]'', concerned with [[Games Workshop]]'s ''[[The Lord of the Rings Strategy Battle Game]]''.
{{DEFAULTSORT:Two Towers: The Best of White Dwarf Magazine, The}}
